That was in KINDERGARDEN!  And how about this you
start flaming me about it when Airly gets mad.  I know
English isn't her first language and so I thought it
would be a polite gesture to help her with it.  I
spent about 2 or 3 minutes trying to decide how best
NOT to offend her and I still get flamed.  Geesh!
